TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_a_laylay_nu_Cuo-kuo, title = a_laylay_nu_Cuo-kuo, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/a_laylay_nu_Cuo-kuo} }

S.FORM: == saayaway a kasumamadan a laylay == Cuo-kuo a laylay a nu makayni i sulit a cudad, tahekal tu i Sang-chaw malingatu izaw tu ku tulu malebut lima lasubu a mihcaan, namakay caliway tunu tusa tuni sulitan a hulic pawacay , Siy-chaw malingatu izaw ku sepat malebut tusa lasubu a mihcaan, namakay Sang-huang-uw-ti atu nakamuan a mihcaan Cuan-suo-se-day malingatu pakala tu sepat malebut enem a lasubu a mihcaan, makay Pan-ku ,San-ti ,Ni-wa nakungkuan nu babalaki a mihcaan pakalal tu lima a mihcaan . (u sulit nu Hulam: .) itepan tu kasumamadan a laylay中世史 piazihan Cuo-kuo-caw-tay kasasumamadan a Cuo-kuo miawas tu pinaay a nikakutay tu laylya nu knatal,Hung-ti mapulung atu malaliyas tu ni u kakutay u zuma satu kapulung tu mihcaan izaw ku Cin-han ,Ci-cin ,Suy-tang ,bey-sung hatini kakatuud kapulung, Yuan-tay ,Min-tay ,Cin-tay , u ni kalaliyasan a mihcaan izaw ku Chun-ciw-zang-ku San-ku Uw-huw-se-luw-ku-se-ciy Nan-pe-caw Uw-day-se-ku Sung-liyaw-cin-yuan zuku. ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 21 a mihcaan, u wawa ni Yu mipatizeng tu China saayaway saicelangay a kamihcaan nu Siy-chaw , zikuzan tu sepat lasubu a mihcaan Tang , mabelin ku Siy-chaw a kamihcaan, u mahini malakuwit tu kuni u kasumamadan henay a laylay a nikauzipan tatenga' u saayaway nu Cung-yuan-wang-shaw , ayaw pakala tu 1046 a mihcaan Zew-wu-wang , malawpes nu Zew-chaw . patizen tu Zew-chaw , Zew namakay Zew-wu-wang , Zew-zen-wang 和Zew-kang-wang mikuwan tulu a laylayan a mihcaan. patizeng kapah tuni pikuwan tu saykay mala Hung-ti tu ci,Cen-wang kang-wang masangangan tu Cen-kang-ze-ce , i tini kala Hung-ti nica sa pangangan han tu Cen-kang-ze-ce a pikuwan. 841 a mihcaan kanatalay a tademaw malebu mala u Cuo-kuo a laylay, tatenga' malingatu tunian a mihcaan, satu u Zew-chaw malingatu tu kalawlawpesan tu, ayaw nu 771 a mihcaan malawpes tu ku Zew-chaw ,patizeng tu Dung-zew ,u Cung-yuan maaalaw pingangayaw tu Chun-ciw-zang-ku a kanatal a kamihcaan. ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 221a mihcaan, malawpes ni Cin-se-huang ku enem a kanatal patizeng satu ku Cin-chau ,palacacay hantu ku China . namahica palebung tu u nipikelec pikuwan nu China , malingatu tu ni Cung-yang a saupu tu sakaku mikuwan nu Hung-ti , ayaw nu 207 a mihcaan malawpes tu ku Cin-chau ,kilul tu ni ngangayaw nu Cu-han-zan-zen ,mademec ni Liw-pang ci Sang-yu i tini i ayaw nu 202 a mihcaan hawsa patineng satu Han-chaw ,Si-han namilawpes tu Wen-cin-ze-ce icelang tu ku Han-uw atu Zaw-sun-ze-ce , China u saicelangay tu a kanatal, mala u kakitaan tu. u nu satipan a Lu-ma-di-cu malecat mala u tabakiay tu Hung-ti a kanatal.

== saayaway a kasomamadan a laylay == Coo-koo a laylay a no makayni i solit a codad, tahekal to i Sang-chaw malingato izaw to ko tolo malebot lima lasobo a mihcaan, namakay caliway tono tosa toni solitan a holic pawacay , Siy-chaw malingato izaw ko sepat malebot tosa lasobo a mihcaan, namakay Sang-hoang-ow-ti ato nakamoan a mihcaan Coan-soo-se-day malingato pakala to sepat malebot enem a lasobo a mihcaan, makay Pan-ko ,San-ti ,Ni-wa nakongkoan no babalaki a mihcaan pakalal to lima a mihcaan . (o solit no Holam: .) itepan to kasomamadan a laylay中世史 piazihan Coo-koo-caw-tay kasasomamadan a Coo-koo miawas to pinaay a nikakotay to laylya no knatal,Hong-ti mapolong ato malaliyas to ni o kakotay o zoma sato kapolong to mihcaan izaw ko Cin-han ,Ci-cin ,Soy-tang ,bey-song hatini kakatood kapolong, Yoan-tay ,Min-tay ,Cin-tay , o ni kalaliyasan a mihcaan izaw ko Chon-ciw-zang-ko San-ko Uw-how-se-low-ko-se-ciy Nan-pe-caw Uw-day-se-ko Song-liyaw-cin-yoan zoko. ayaw no kasomamadan to 21 a mihcaan, o wawa ni Yo mipatizeng to China saayaway saicelangay a kamihcaan no Siy-chaw , zikozan to sepat lasobo a mihcaan Tang , mabelin ko Siy-chaw a kamihcaan, o mahini malakowit to koni o kasomamadan henay a laylay a nikaozipan tatenga' o saayaway no Cong-yoan-wang-shaw , ayaw pakala to 1046 a mihcaan Zew-wo-wang , malawpes no Zew-chaw . patizen to Zew-chaw , Zew namakay Zew-wo-wang , Zew-zen-wang 和Zew-kang-wang mikowan tolo a laylayan a mihcaan. patizeng kapah toni pikowan to saykay mala Hong-ti to ci,Cen-wang kang-wang masangangan to Cen-kang-ze-ce , i tini kala Hong-ti nica sa pangangan han to Cen-kang-ze-ce a pikowan. 841 a mihcaan kanatalay a tademaw malebo mala o Coo-koo a laylay, tatenga' malingato tonian a mihcaan, sato o Zew-chaw malingato to kalawlawpesan to, ayaw no 771 a mihcaan malawpes to ko Zew-chaw ,patizeng to Dong-zew ,o Cong-yoan maaalaw pingangayaw to Chon-ciw-zang-ko a kanatal a kamihcaan. ayaw no kasomamadan to 221a mihcaan, malawpes ni Cin-se-hoang ko enem a kanatal patizeng sato ko Cin-chao ,palacacay hanto ko China . namahica palebong to o nipikelec pikowan no China , malingato to ni Cong-yang a saopo to sakako mikowan no Hong-ti , ayaw no 207 a mihcaan malawpes to ko Cin-chao ,kilol to ni ngangayaw no Co-han-zan-zen ,mademec ni Liw-pang ci Sang-yo i tini i ayaw no 202 a mihcaan hawsa patineng sato Han-chaw ,Si-han namilawpes to Wen-cin-ze-ce icelang to ko Han-ow ato Zaw-son-ze-ce , China o saicelangay to a kanatal, mala o kakitaan to. o no satipan a Lo-ma-di-co malecat mala o tabakiay to Hong-ti a kanatal.
